screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .chproj file in Adobe Character Animator 2023
screenshot.caption: CHPROJ file open in Adobe Character Animator 2023

description: Character Animator is included with Adobe Creative Cloud and allows you to animate characters based on your movements and templates packaged with the software. You can also import designs from Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator .

When you save an animation project with Character Animator, the application creates a CHPROJ file to store the contents. You can then close the project, re-open it, and continue editing the project at a later time. To create a CHPROJ file in Adobe Character Animator, select File → New Project... , modify the project, then select File → Save Project or Save Project As... .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .chproj file in Adobe Character Animator 2023
images.caption: CHPROJ file open in Adobe Character Animator 2023
